title: Guerilla Gravity Trail Pistol is now fully Revved, new carbon rear end drops 300g
content:
It was just over two years ago that Guerilla Gravity introduced framed built with Revved carbon tech. For a company that previously made everything out of metal, the inclusion of carbon was not taken lightly. But also, this was not your standard carbon fiber. Instead, Revved carbon uses a patented manufacturing process to create thermoplastic […]

The post Guerilla Gravity Trail Pistol is now fully Revved, new carbon rear end drops 300g appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
